chapter.text: You reach the end of the bathroom, sliding your back up against the wall. ^1500You look up at the monster as it approaches. ^1500It looks at the mirrors, and rips one off the wall. ^1500It walks towards you with the mirror in hand. ^1500It holds the sharp edge of the glass to your chest, and begins to dig into you. ^1500You hear a crack. ^1500Then another. ^1500Pain shivers through your body. ^1500With one swift push, the mirror digs through your chest, hearing scratches of it hitting the wall behind you. ^1500Your vision goes dark.
